# Music Poster Gallery

> A curated music poster collection platform providing high-quality poster resources for music enthusiasts

## Core Features
- [Poster Browsing](https://music-poster.com/en): Beautiful music poster gallery with category filtering
- [Free Downloads](https://music-poster.com/en): High-resolution posters available for free personal use
- [Category Navigation](https://music-poster.com/en): Organized by themes like earphones, country music, music classroom, and wall art

## Main Pages
- [Home Gallery](https://music-poster.com/en): Featured poster showcase with intuitive visual experience
- [Category Pages](https://music-poster.com/en/category): Browse by theme to find your preferred style
- [Poster Details](https://music-poster.com/en/poster): Individual poster information and download options
